Research

Publications

  • Inverse transport problems in quantitative PAT for molecular imaging (with K. Ren and R. Zhang), submitted Inverse Problems, 31, 125012, 2015.

  • A fast algorithm for radiative transport in isotropic media (with K.Ren and R.Zhang), submitted.

  • Reconstruction of acoustic and optical properties in PAT/TAT with data from multiple illuminations (with K.Ren), Preprint, 2016

  • Recovering point soures in unknown inhomogeneous environments (with K.Ren), In preparation, 2016
